Class SldPlanets

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.advCards.sealed.SldPlanets
public final class SldPlanets extends SldAdvCard
Represents a "Planets" adventure card in the game. This card allows players to land on specific planets, potentially incurring penalties or gaining benefits. It manages the landing process, tracks landed players, and applies effects based on planet interactions. It extends SldAdvCard and provides specific logic for planet exploration.

  • Constructor Details

    • SldPlanets

      public SldPlanets(int id, int level, int daysLost, List<Planet> planets)
      Constructs a new SldPlanets adventure card.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this planets card.
      level - The level of the planets, potentially influencing their effects.
      daysLost - The number of days lost as a penalty for landing on a planet.
      planets - A list of Planet objects available on this card.

      public Map<Planet,Player> getLandedPlayers()

      Overrides:
      getLandedPlayers in class SldAdvCard
      Returns:
      A Map where keys are Planet objects and values are the Player objects who landed on them.

    • loadPlanets

      public static SldPlanets loadPlanets(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Static factory method to load an SldPlanets object from a JSON node. It parses the node to extract ID, level, days lost, and a list of planets, then constructs a new SldPlanets instance.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the Planets card data.
      Returns:
      A new SldPlanets instance populated with data from the JSON node.

    • init

      public void init(GameServer game)
      Initializes the Planets card's state and context within the game. Resets the passedPlayers count, sets up game and fly board references, and initializes iterators for players and planets.
      Specified by:
      init in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      game - The GameServer instance managing the current game.

    • land

      public void land(Player player, int planetIndex)
      Handles a player's decision to land on a planet or skip landing. This method is called when a player makes a choice regarding landing.
      Overrides:
      land in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      player - The Player making the landing decision.
      planetIndex - The index of the planet the player wishes to land on. Use -1 if the player does not want to land.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the card is not in the PLANET_CHOICE state.
      BadPlayerException - if the provided player is not the current active player.
      BadParameterException - if the planet index is out of bounds or the chosen planet is already taken.

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect()
      Applies the effect of the Planets card. For each player who successfully landed on a planet, they incur a penalty of daysLost. After applying the effects, it proceeds to process the next planet.
      Overrides:
      applyEffect in class SldAdvCard

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer()
      Sets the next player to make a landing choice. If there are more players in the allowedPlayers list, the card state transitions to PLANET_CHOICE for the next player. The logic for finalizing the card or moving to applyEffect after all players have chosen is expected to be handled by the calling context or external game loop based on passedPlayers count.
      Overrides:
      setNextPlayer in class SldAdvCard

    • setNextPlanet

      public void setNextPlanet()
      Iterates through the planets on the card, processing each one. If a planet has a player landed on it, that player becomes the actualPlayer, and a LandOnPlanetEvent is added to the game events. Once all planets have been iterated, the card state transitions to FINALIZED.
